name: On the Scotch coaster (slate tile)
description:
There's just something about placing a real nice single malt whisky onto slate tile. Something regal. Makes you feel like a king.

This celtic themed slate tile, official merchandise of "On the Scotch", is the perfect throne for your whisky-filled glass. With it's perotective felt underside your dram will look and feel perfectly at home on this perfect little treat of a coaster.

name: Sláinte Mhath (Glencairn Glass)
description:
Champagne, Brandy, Wine... each has its own glass. Yet whisky, the worlds most complex spirit can be found served in anything from hiball tumblers to Paris goblets. Now you can enjoy your whisky in the right glass... better yet; you can enjoy it in this stunningly engraved Glencairn Glass.

Sláinte Mhath!

name: Le Snob: Whisky (by John Lamond)
description: John Lamond, Master of Malt, brings us this incredible new hardcover whisky must-have. Do you have a taste for perfection? If so, "Le Snob: Whisky" is the book for you. Evocative and richly appointed with little-known facts, this book is about savouring the world's most sophisticated spirit to the full. It celebrates the fine distinctions between name, place, tradition and taste that elevate whisky appreciation to an art in itself.

name: I Love Whisky (T-shirt)
description:
Okay, it sort of says "I [glass] whisky" - but the sentiment still remains. This screen-printed design, featuring the iconic shape of the Glencairn Glass, is perfect for anyone who truly loves whisky (or good-looking T-shirts for that matter).

Please allow a couple of weeks for delivery as we may not have your size in stock; though it shouldn't take too long to get it made up for you.
